name: Curvature Warfare
description:
Game made for the GeoJam 2022! 

You are a happy little square minding your own business, until suddently your peace is interrupted by circles! Sadly, they don't know that squares are simply superior because they can replace their sides with weapons and money farms.

Use the possible upgrades to replace your square's sides to try to survive as long as possible by killing those inferior curves and have the highest score imagineable!

Beware for the big circle though! It has the power to stun one of your sides, disabling that side until it dies, so don't be too greedy!
